text: Munofiqon ʙa Alloh savgand mexurand, ki naguftaand cizero, ki Pajomʙar va musalmonon az on norohat savand, vale kalimai kufrro ʙar zaʙon rondaand. Va pas az on ki islom ovarda ʙudand, kofir sudaand. Va ʙar qasd kor kardand, ki ʙa Pajomʙar Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam zararho ovarand, ammo ʙa on noil nasudand. Va munofiqon cizero inkor nakardand, magar Allohu pajomʙarasro, ki az ƣanimatho sarvatmandason kardand. Pas, agar tavʙa kunand, nekiason dar on ast va agar ruj gardonand, Alloh ʙa azoʙi dardnoke dar dunjovu oxirat azoʙason xohad kard va onhoro dar rui zamin na dustdore xohad ʙud, ki azoʙi Allohro az onho ʙozdorad va na madadkore, ki az azoʙi Alloh nacotason dihad
